meanings.sent1: The farmer was overmilking the cow, causing it discomfort.
meanings.sent2: She warned him not to overmilk the cow, as it could lead to health issues.
meanings.sent3: The cow rolled its eyes at the farmer, tired of being overmilked every day.
meanings.sent4: Overmilking the cow was like trying to draw water from a dry well.
meanings.sent5: The image of the overmilked cow stuck in his mind, reminding him to be more careful.

meanings.definition: The act of milking a cow excessively.
meanings.sent1: Overmilking can lead to health problems for the cow.
meanings.sent2: The overmilking of the cow was evident from the decrease in milk production.
meanings.sent3: The overmilking incident became the talk of the town, much to the farmer's embarrassment.
meanings.sent4: The overmilking of the cow symbolized the greed of the farmer.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the overmilking process made her cringe, realizing the harm it caused.
